items.text: back of a length, dropped down the pitch
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: swept with the angle to deep fine leg
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Mohammed, 1 run

items.text: advances and times a drive to silly mid-off who dives and stops
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: makes room and cuts through cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.preText: Divy: "I have said it not once, but several times Hetmeyer looks like the real deal. But a flawed angel as of now, one who makes too many errors after playing some of the best textbook shots. But he'll only grow, another era, he might have not even been in the selection rounds after a few failures, but hope he takes these opportunities with both hands and book his place in the side. "
items.text: flighted outside off, crunched to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Mohammed, 1 run

items.text: backs away and punches to extra cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: straightening on off, makes room and cuts late to deep backward point
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, FOUR runs

items.preText:
Mehidy

NJ: "Excellent game this is indeed !!! No 350+ score and still the match can be anyone's at this stage. RR is nearly 8 and the wicket seems to have no demons either. An Indian fan hooked to this exciting game - wish it is tie tonight."
items.text: width outside off, cut to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammed, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, spins away, drops to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: full on off, driven to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: shifts back and flicks to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: length on off, punched to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammed, 1 run

items.text: cut late to deep backward point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.preText: If you're a BD fan, breathe easy now.. for here comes Shakib
items.text: slides into middle and leg, worked off the inside of the bat to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammed, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside off, hammered straight back at Shakib's boot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: flat back of a length, tucked to square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.preText: Asif pkAs: "Hi akshy how's the wicket playing? Is it hard to score runs or just windies are too cautious." Not easy to score. Grip, turn, bounce: a bt of something for everyone
items.text: full, driven back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammed, no run

items.text: short of a length, straightens on off, punched to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammed, no run

items.text: slides in viciously, hurriedly fends it away through third man after scampering away
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammed, 1 run

items.text: comes down the track and blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammed, no run

items.text: easy! This was a mistake waiting to happen, what with the mounting asking rate. Jason comes charging down the track and swings without accounting for the turn, or lack thereof, and gets an edge that settles right into the hands of Mushfiqur's gloves. He also takes the bails off, just in case. West Indies sliding
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammed, OUT

dismissal.text: JN Mohammed c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 10 (19b 0x4 0x6) SR: 52.63

items.text: stays back and whips to midwicket
